text: Angels in the Outfield is a 1994 American family sports fantasy comedy-drama movie directed by William Dear. It is a remake of the 1951 movie of the same name. Category:1994 movies Category:1990s family movies Category:1994 comedy- drama movies Category:1990s sports movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Baseball movies
title: Angels in the Outfield (1994 movie)
